## FieldProperties.setDerived() method

Determines if field is bound to datasource or not. Inherited but cannot be changed

**Signature:**

```typescript
setDerived(flag: boolean): FieldProperties;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  flag | boolean | The flag to set for the derived state (ignored as it cannot be changed). |

**Returns:**

[FieldProperties](./forms42core.fieldproperties.md)

The current instance of `FieldProperties`<!-- -->.
